备忘：
一、宏发设备订阅返回数据：
Received `{"SSN":"4C36210605133128","DataUp04":"76B80000002F01042C00000000000000000003000100010001003F000000000000003C3797FFDB9045000000000000435DC9280025","TM":"220105165657"}` from `hongfa/FF3D210725113600/upload/` topic
Received `{"GWD_RAW_04":"D3F60000001100040E001700020002FFD1212006105728","SD_RAW_04":"FE290007000F00040C000300014C36210605133128"}` from `hongfa/FFD1212006105728/upload/` topic
Received `{"GWD_RAW_04":"D3F60000001100040E001700020002FFD1212006105728","SD_RAW_04":"63FD000D000F00040C000500026B02210710091756"}` from `hongfa/FFD1212006105728/upload/` topic

hongfa/（FF3D210725113600）/upload/：括号内是网关ID
SSN：从机设备ID号
    4C36210605133128
    6B02210710091756
DataUp04：Modbus TCP 原始值（16 进制的字符型）
TM：时间戳

"GWD_RAW_04":"D3F60000001100040E001700020002FFD1212006105728"
D3F6 0000 0011 00 04 0E 001700020002FFD1212006105728
"SD_RAW_04":"FE290007000F00040C000300014C36210605133128"
1P: FE29 0007 000F 00 04 0C 0003 0001 4C36210605133128
3P: 63FD 000D 000F 00 04 0C 0005 0002 6B02210710091756
"""
response
展开1
9DA50016002F01  04      2C          402C0EA43B6147AE13880000013B00014C36210605133128186BDD5E000000000000000000000000845200C1
9CA0002C002B01  04      28          542CEE596AD453D80001000100000000000000000000000000000000000100010000FFFF3B6147AE
3A950000002F02  04      2C          000000000000000000050001003A0001000000000000000000000000003F0000000000000000000000000000
MBAP报文头       功能码   数据长度      数据

MBAP报文头:
9DA5     0016    002F    01
9CA0     002C    002B    01
3A95     0000    002F    02
CRC检验码 起始寄存器地址 长度 单元标识符

数据展开：
0~7
402C0EA43B6147AE13880000013B0001
542CEE596AD453D80001000100000000
000000000000000000050001003A0001

8~15
4C36210605133128186BDD5E00000000
00000000000000000000000000010001
000000000000000000000000003F0000

16~
3D28E3E60000435F7F810026
0000FFFF3B6147AE
000000000000000000000000

起始寄存器地址开始，每两个字节对应一个数据
以2C为例：

# 断路器上线报文
Received `{"GWD_RAW_04":"D3F60000001100040E001700020002FFD1212006105728","SD_RAW_04":"FE290007000F00040C000300014C36210605133128"}` from `hongfa/FFD1212006105728/upload/` topic
Received `{"GWD_RAW_04":"D3F60000001100040E001700020002FFD1212006105728","SD_RAW_04":"63FD000D000F00040C000500026B02210710091756"}` from `hongfa/FFD1212006105728/upload/` topic

# CRC在线计算器
http://www.ip33.com/crc.html

# Python paho-mqtt 示例
https://www.cnblogs.com/lnn123/p/10837754.html
